Class DiscreteLogarithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • bid.mythesis.logarithm.DiscreteLogarithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BabyStepGiantStep, BruteForce, IndexCalculus, PollardsRhoDL, SilverPohligHellman

    public abstract class DiscreteLogarithm
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class for solving of discrete logarithm problem

                            java.math.BigInteger a,

                            int maxBigIntegerMapSize)
        Create instance of class
        Parameters:
        g - left site of congruence g^x = a (mod n)
        a - right site of congruence g^x = a (mod n)
        n - prime modulus of congruence g^x = a (mod n)
        maxBigIntegerMapSize - Algorithm using Map of BigInteger, because of memory limits specify maximum size
